title: Private life of a silkworm
brief_description: Covers all phases in the production of natural silk; close-ups of silkworm feeding on mulberry leaves; spinning cocoon; mechanical separation of males and females; mating and laying of eggs; removal of silk from cocoons; spinning of individual strands into a thread; weighing and checking hanks; weaving of silk cloth.
